meanings.definition: Used to express anger or frustration.
meanings.sent2: Oh goddammit, I forgot my keys again.
meanings.sent3: Goddammit, why does the toast always burn when I'm in a hurry?
meanings.sent4: The traffic was a goddammit river of brake lights.
meanings.sent5: The thunderstorm roared like a goddammit beast in the night.

meanings.definition: An exclamation of annoyance or irritation.
meanings.sent1: Goddammit! I can't find my phone.
meanings.sent2: Hey, goddammit, stop kicking my chair!
meanings.sent3: Goddammit, why does the Wi-Fi always act up when I need it most?
meanings.sent4: The constant buzzing of the fly was a goddammit reminder of summer.
meanings.sent5: The alarm clock rang like a goddammit banshee in the morning.
